properties.description: Create table with HASH Distribution and CCI

content.query:
EXECUTE AS USER = 'IngestAccount'


CREATE TABLE [dbo].[03_Franmer_Demo_RoundRobin]
WITH
( DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN , CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX )
AS
SELECT  *
FROM    [dbo].[01_Franmer_Demo_Heap]; 

SELECT COUNT_BIG(*) as Nb_Rows FROM [dbo].[03_Franmer_Demo_RoundRobin]
